titles: A letter to George Keith concerning the salvability of the heathen together with a testimony to the same doctrine, as long held and not newly taken up, out of several former books of him that writ it / by J.H.
author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

publisher: Printed and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
